name: Negative Verify PUT request successfully updates chatbot details -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends PUT request to update chatbot details with chatbot_id "a4bdb755-64bb-4fa8-a35e-209810c70bda", chatbot_name "New updated Name", chatbot_description "Updated through Automation suite", and env_id "f0b53f20-5ebe-4132-cbea-68725ef2c5c8"
When the user receives the response
Then the status code returned should be 400
And the response should contain error variable with value Bad Request
And the response should contain the The chatbot must be in AVAILABLE status

fullName: Update Chatbot API: Negative Verify PUT request successfully updates chatbot details
